name: AlternativeAnimalFacts
0:
”Alexa, open Alternative Animal Facts and tell me a new animal fact.”
”Alexa, open Alternative Animal Facts and get me a new fact.”
”Alexa, open Alternative Animal Facts and give me a fact.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: alternative animal facts
des: Teach Alexa everything she needs to know about animals--except all of it is hilariously wrong. Enjoy fun fake facts like "Gorilla eggs are worth over $9,000.00" and "Butterflies are actually carnivores".
